name: Repair and Run
description:
Repair your car as you try to win the race, and avoid being hit so your car won't explode! Have fun playing this driving-puzzle game made by four game design students.

A game made in 48h for the Global Game Jam 2020 by the four Tecnoboys:

@DaniRiwez : Twitter - LinkedIn

@Galmoli_dev : Twitter - LinkedIn

@Roveloper : Portfolio - LinkedIn

@MartiGuillot : Twitter - LinkedIn
